text: How to assert that zero or only one of N given arguments is passed
I have a definition like this

code:
def bar(self, foo=None, bar=None, baz=None):
    pass

text: I want to make sure a maximum of one of foo, bar, baz is passed.

code:
if foo and bar:
    raise Ex()

if foo and baz:
    raise Ex()
....

text: But there got be something simpler.
